title: I have a problem with my Map
body:
Hello

So whenever i try to look around on the Mini Map/Map it works but i cant go back to my character. Here is a better example.

So i try to look around on my map and i cant go back to my character im stuck looking around on the map.
Can someone help me please.

replies.body:
If you haven't changed the keybind, try hitting space to lock the camera back to your champion. If that doesn't work at first, do me a favor and try resetting your keybinds really quick and trying it then.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
